review: I installed this today on my not smart tv -- and voila -- movies, tv shows, etc -- all for $34.99 (on sale).  Easy to install for a non-techie -- easy to use.  It comes with a tiny remote -- few buttons and easy to use.  I then installed the free app on my iphone and can now use that as a voice controlled remote.  So simple, so easy, so inexpensive.  Made my day!
